version_description:
Estamos trabajando constantemente para hacer Documents mejor para ti. Aquí tienes lo nuevo en esta versión:

- Correcciones de errores para iPad Pro 10.5.
- Mejoras generales de rendimiento y estabilidad.

Aquí en Readdle, estamos construyendo el ecosistema del “trabajo del futuro” con apps y servicios que llevarán tu productividad hacia el siguiente nivel. Compruébalo en readdle.com para más información.

¡Gracias por utilizar Documents 6! Si tienes un momento deja una reseña en la App Store, te estaremos realmente agradecidos.
- stability and performance improvements

We’re constantly working to make Documents 6 better for you. Here what’s new in this version:

- General performance and stability improvements.

Here at Readdle, we are building the “future of work” ecosystem of apps and services that take your productivity to the next level. Check out readdle.com for more.
Thank you for using Documents 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

We’re constantly working to make Documents 6 better for you. Here what’s new in this version:
– General performance and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Documents 6! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

Documents gets amazing iOS 11 updates and now supports the new Drag and Drop on iPad!

What’s new?
– Drop email attachments from email or any other app into Documents;
– Save images and text from Safari by dragging and dropping them directly into Documents.

Now Documents and other Readdle’s apps like Spark, PDF Expert, Scanner Pro, Calendars and Printer Pro are one step closer to a powerful ecosystem that redefines what is possible on your Apple devices.

Documents gets amazing iOS 11 updates and now supports the new Drag and Drop on iPad!

What’s new?
– Drop email attachments from email or any other app into Documents;
– Save images and text from Safari by dragging and dropping them directly into Documents.

Now Documents and other Readdle’s apps like Spark, PDF Expert, Scanner Pro, Calendars and Printer Pro are one step closer to a powerful ecosystem that redefines what is possible on your Apple devices.

Our team is working hard to make Documents better for you! In this update:
- Stability and performance improvements.

Our team is working hard to make Documents better for you! In this update:
- Stability and performance improvements.

*New video formats*
- Documents now supports all popular video formats from AVI to FLV and MP4. Nothing should stop you from watching your favorite movie.
*Documents browser adds Tabs! (iPad only)*
- Tabbed browsing will help you surf the Internet quickly, and easily download files you want.

Bonus: This update brings a super powerful integration of Scanner Pro on your iPad! Easily scan your documents and save in one app - Documents.
Now Documents and other Readdle’s apps like Spark, Scanner Pro, PDF Expert, Calendars and Printer Pro are one step closer to a powerful ecosystem that redefines what is possible on your Apple devices.

Hello, everyone!
As the year comes to a close we wanted to push out one more update that addresses some of the top issues we’ve seen reported by you.
From all of us at Readdle, have a safe and happy holiday season!

** A bunch of improvements in Browser**
- Since now downloads keep going right from the point you’ve paused or interrupted your previous session;
- Added the file size indication during the download;
- Added the badge count with a number of downloaded items.

**Fixed**
- Fixed an issue where .docs files have not been downloaded in Browser successfully;
- Mended an issue where Drag & Drop didn’t work properly on iOS 10;
- And the icing on the cake is the improved FTP/SFTP performance.

We love hearing from you! Get in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Documents now supports iPhone X and its advanced Face ID technology!
This is another step towards creating the best file management experience on your iPhone and iPad.
The update also fixes bugs and provides general performance improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

Navigate through your PDFs with a Brand New Search!
Now you can simply find what you’ve highlighted by searching within your annotations and bookmarks or even filter annotations by color.
The update also fixes bugs and provides general improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

Navigate through your PDFs with a Brand New Search!
Now you can simply find what you’ve highlighted by searching within your annotations and bookmarks or even filter annotations by color.
The update also fixes bugs and provides general improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

Navigate through your PDFs with a Brand New Search!
Now you can simply find what you’ve highlighted by searching within your annotations and bookmarks or even filter annotations by color.
The update also fixes bugs and provides general improvements.
If you like the update - please leave us a review.

We’re pleased to bring you Documents 6.2.5 release with a number of core fixes and improvements.
*New*
Added the +/-15 sec Rewind feature in Music Player. One simple swipe on the track cover will take you 15 seconds back or forward through your audiobook. Enjoy!

*Fixed*
- Resolved an issue with link downloads from the built-in browser;
- Fixed an issue with the file import to iWorks and iBooks;
- Mended an issue with bookmarks in Book Reader.

To unleash full power of iOS 11 within Documents and provide you with the best experience in file management, we need to drop support for iOS 9.
Please update your devices to the latest iOS if you want to receive further updates of Documents.

We love hearing from you! Get in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com
We think you’ll be pleased with the update. If you are, leave a review in the App Store.
Thank you in advance!

We’re pleased to bring you Documents 6.2.6 release with a number of core fixes and improvements.
*New*
Added the +/-15 sec Rewind feature in Music Player. One simple swipe on the track cover will take you 15 seconds back or forward through your audiobook. Enjoy!

*Fixed*
- Resolved an issue with link downloads from the built-in browser;
- Fixed an issue with the file import to iWorks and iBooks;
- Mended an issue with bookmarks in Book Reader.

To unleash full power of iOS 11 within Documents and provide you with the best experience in file management, we need to drop support for iOS 9.
Please update your devices to the latest iOS if you want to receive further updates of Documents.

We love hearing from you! Get in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com
We think you’ll be pleased with the update. If you are, leave a review in the App Store.
Thank you in advance!

As the year comes to a close we wanted to push out one more update that addresses some of the top issues we’ve seen reported by you.
From all of us at Readdle, have a safe and happy holiday season!

** A bunch of improvements in Browser**
- Since now downloads keep going right from the point you’ve paused or interrupted your previous session;

**Fixed**

Happy New Year, everyone!
Let’s start 2018 with the first in this year Documents update, which brings you a number of major fixes and improvements!
- The feature you can’t see, but you can sure feel it. Now Documents’ launch speed time becomes faster than ever before.
- Page Management with a Grid View in PDF Viewer works like a charm. Tap thumbnails of pages for a quick navigation through the document.
- Download progress bar is now under your control; so you can always know when the content is locally available on your device.

We think you’ll be pleased with the update.
If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Good day, everyone!
Today we’re bringing you a handful of important fixes.
The most prominent one is the fix for Dropbox sign-in issue on iOS 10 devices, that was brought to our attention by you, our dear customers.

Until next time!
If you need us earlier, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Documents gets an amazing update with an enhanced PDF reader, new cloud file management, and smart mp3 search!

*** Two-page view ***
Now you can view two pages of your PDFs side by side like a book or a magazine.
*** Read PDFs with comfort ***
Read PDFs in Sepia or Night modes, select vertical or horizontal scrolling and crop pages for more enjoyable reading.
*** The best new way to manage files in the cloud ***
- Drag and drop files within your cloud storage, to another service (e.g. from Google Drive to Dropbox) or even into a local folder.
- Find your files in the cloud faster by adding them to Favorites.
- Get an immediate preview of your cloud files with a thumbnail view. Save your time!
*** Search songs by metadata ***
A marvelous match for audio lovers! Starting today you can find your songs by metadata: a track title, artist, album name or even genre.
*** Double tap to skip 10 sec ***
Fast forward or rewind video by double-tapping on the right or left pane.

Last but not least:
Check your files for metadata info. The file size, date of creation, date of last change, location and file format are no longer hidden from your eyes.

More great features are coming soon. If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Documents to your friends!
We're always here for you at rdsupport@readdle.com

Thanks to your speedy feedback on version 6.3, we're back with a number of hotfixes and improvements:

- Fixed an issue where large video files stopped playing after a while;
- Corrected file saving for specific links in Browser;
- Resolved a network issue with moved folders;
- Improved stability for Photo Library and Network section.

If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Documents to your friends!
We're always here for you at rdsupport@readdle.com

As your feedback continues to roll in, we continue to thoroughly address it.
Today's update brings fixes for the following bottleneck issues:

- Improved Dropbox synchronization stability;
- Fixed an issue in OneDrive with specific shared folders.

If you see any other oddities in the app, please drop us a line at rdsupport@readdle.com
We're always here for you!

We're back again to you!
Today's update addresses the fix for an issue with URL schemes.
Also under the hood stability improvements and crash exorcism.

If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Documents to your friends.
We're always here for you at rdsupport@readdle.com

Documents has been supercharged with another set of powerful features:

**Revamped audio player**
Media player’s got a fresh look to help you enjoy your music more.
**The new music library**
You can now play entire music folders in literally one tap.
**‘Recently deleted’ folder**
Your deleted files will stay there for 30 days. Restore or delete them - up to you.
**Vertical scroll for EPUB**
Scroll your EPUB books the way you like it – up, down, left, right!
**Save file copies to the cloud**
Keep your PDF files secure and handy by saving a copy to a cloud storage.

More great features are coming soon. If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Documents to your friends!
If you need us sooner, drop us a line at rdsupport@readdle.com

With Apple’s WWDC 2018 right around the corner we didn’t want to throw away our shot at bringing you one more update.
Much of the work was focused on a deep dive into the internal stability and improvements.
Thank you to all who took the time to write in to rdsupport@readdle.com

Stay tuned! Exciting features are coming soon!

Meet Wi-Fi Transfer, a fast and intuitive way to transfer your files from iPhone or iPad to Mac or PC and vice versa.

- It’s super fast regardless of your Internet speed;
- You can transfer files and folders of any size in bulk;
- It works with all popular file formats;
- You can transfer files from/to Mac or PC without any additional setup.

Also this update brings you a powerful integration of Scanner Pro and Documents on your iPhone!
From now on you're able to scan books, documents and receipts to PDFs and annotate them - all in one app.

We believe these features meet all your needs. If not - just drop us a line at rdsupport@readdle.com
Stay tuned!

Much of the work in today’s update was focused on a deep dive into the internal stability and improvements.
Thank you to all who took the time to write in to rdsupport@readdle.com

Exciting features are coming soon!
If you want to thank our tireless team, please write a review or recommend Documents to your friends!

Hello again, folks!
We apologize for the back-to-back update.
It turned out that a version of 6.5.3 didn't contain all of the fixes we planned to release.

Keep in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for news and exciting features!

Today we’re bringing you a fantastic update with a few long-wished-for features:

- Meet SMB v2 support!
High-speed filesharing and enhanced data protection are at your service now.
- Browser Tabs on iPhone!
Now you can switch between different tabs to boost your search experience in the Web.

We hope you enjoy the update as much as we do.
Keep in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for news and exciting features.

Today's update brings a hotfix for the issue with Google sign-in.
Thank you to all who reached out at rdsupport@readdle.com and helped us track down the bug; without you, this fix would not have been possible.

Readdle Team is back to you with a feature you've been waiting for: now you can watch videos at your own tempo!
Just select your comfortable video speed right on the screen or double tap to skip 10 seconds.

We hope you enjoy the release as much as we do.
As always, you can reach us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Keep the feedback coming!

Today's update brings a hotfix for the issues with Audio Player.
Thank you to all who reached out at rdsupport@readdle.com

Stay tuned! Exciting features are coming soon!

Hello folks!
This week we've been working on a number of quality of life improvements to Documents and you'll see some of those in this update.
## Fixed
- Fixed an issue with highlight and text selection tools.

Thanks for your continuing feedback. We love hearing from you!
If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Introducing Photo Albums in Documents!
Now you can view your lovely photos from iPhone on a larger screen right on your Mac, PC or even TV.

Just give it a try!
Open the Photo Album folder in Documents. Go to docstransfer.com on your Mac, PC or TV, scan the QR code and voilà - now all your photos are on the large screen.

We hope you love this update as much as we do.
Keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for new exciting features!

Introducing Photo Albums in Documents!
Now you can view your lovely photos from iPhone on a larger screen right on your Mac, PC or even TV.

Just give it a try!
Open the Photo Album folder in Documents. Go to docstransfer.com on your Mac, PC or TV, scan the QR code and voilà - now all your photos are on the large screen.

We hope you love this update as much as we do.
Keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for new exciting features!

Happy upcoming holidays, friends!
Before the final rush of the season, we wanted to provide you with one more update that brings a few extra bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you to everyone who got in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com during this year.
From all of us at Readdle, have a safe, wonderful and happy holiday season!

Happy New Year, everyone!
Let’s start 2019 with the first in this year Documents 6.8.3 update, that addresses some of the issues we wanted to fix in the previous year.
May the new year be super productive for you and your family!

If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com
We love hearing from you!

In this update you'll find a bunch of fixes for the most prevalent bugs, we've seen reported by many of you.
Keep in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for news and exciting features!

In this update you'll find a bunch of fixes for the most prevalent bugs, we've seen reported by many of you.
Keep in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for news and exciting features!

Today's update brings a hotfix for the issues with Google Drive connection.
Thank you to all who reached out at rdsupport@readdle.com and helped us track down the bug; without you, this fix would not have been possible.

Stay tuned!

This week we've been working on a number of quality of life improvements to Documents and you'll see some of those in this update.
## Fixed
- Fixed an issue with highlight and text selection tools.

Thanks for your continuing feedback. We love hearing from you!
If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Today's update brings a hotfix for the issues with Audio Player.
Thank you to all who reached out at rdsupport@readdle.com

Stay tuned! Exciting features are coming soon!

Today’s update is all about new features!

## FileDrop
Now you can instantly share your files of any format or entire folders with a nearby iPhone or iPad.
The only condition is that Documents is installed and active on these both devices. Give it a try!

## Download in Background
Starting today you can download files from the Web while playing games or exploring other apps. Thank you to everyone who got in touch and let us know this feature was important to them!

## Vietnamese Language is at your service now!
Từ bây giờ, người dùng Việt Nam có thể trải nghiệm tất cả tính năng tốt nhất của Documents trong tiếng Việt.
Điều này sẽ không thể xảy ra nếu không có những thông dịch viên tiếng Việt tuyệt vời, chúng tôi xin cảm ơn các bạn.

If you have questions or need support just pop on over to rdsupport@readdle.com and we’ll point you in the right direction.

Good day, folks!
We're back again to you with a few small but important bug fixes and improvements for transferring files via Wi-Fi to or from your computer.
Now, instead of scanning QR code to establish a secure connection with the remote device, our dev team created a simpler way - a 4-digit code.
All you need to do is to go to https://docstransfer.com on desktop and enter this code to sign in.

We hope you'll enjoy this update as much as we do!
Thank you to everyone who took the time to write in to rdsupport@readdle.com with tips and hints to help us track down these issues.
Stay tuned! Exciting features are coming soon!

Today's update to Documents brings along a couple of fixes towards the app stability.
Keep in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com and stay tuned for news and exciting features!

Welcome to the all-new Documents 7!
Today’s update brings some great enhancements to your favourite file manager, including the features we’ve all been waiting for.
Let’s dive in!

## Meet the Plus Button
Starting today you can add files to Documents from other apps or just create a new folder by tapping a + button. Enjoy!

## New Enhanced Browser
It looks delightful and supports private browsing to respect your privacy.

## Integration with Files App
Now you can access your media and documents stored in the Files app right from Documents.

## Mark up images
Have fun and add some colors to your screenshots and images.

## Stunning Dark Mode
A cool new look that’s easy on the eyes and perfect for low‑light environments. Turn it on and come to the Dark Side!

## New PDF annotations
Try new annotation tools! Make your PDFs memorable with various pens, highlighter, and shapes.

We hope you love this update as much as we’ve loved making it.
If you have questions or need support just pop on over to rdsupport@readdle.com and we’ll point you in the right direction.

Happy holidays, friends!
Before the final rush of the season, we wanted to provide you with one more update that brings a few extra bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you to everyone who got in touch with us at rdsupport@readdle.com during this year.
From all of us at Readdle, have a safe, wonderful and happy holiday season!
See you in 2020!

Documents Team is back to you in 2020!
Today’s update is all about bringing more great features to your favorite file manager! Let’s dive in, shall we?

*** Meet video gestures!
Now you can pause, seek or change the brightness of the screen using a simple two-finger swipe!

*** Modify lock-screen player
Are you a keen audio lover? Now you can listen to any audiobooks with even more comfort – replace Track Skip with Time Skip to seek to a point you want. Enjoy!

*** Edit audio metadata
Organize your music library by changing names of artists, albums, genres and more.
*** Adjust shortcuts
Pin your favorite websites to access them faster.

More exciting features are coming soon!
We hope you love this update as much as we’ve loved making it.
If you need us you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Good day, everyone!
Today's update contains a few important changes on the heels of our major 7.1 update a few days ago.
And just in case you missed our release notes we've included them below:

*** Meet video gestures!
Now you can pause, seek or change the brightness of the screen using a simple two-finger swipe!

*** Modify lock-screen player
Are you a keen audio lover? Now you can listen to any audiobooks with even more comfort – replace Track Skip with Time Skip to seek to a point you want. Enjoy!

*** Edit audio metadata
Organize your music library by changing names of artists, albums, genres and more.

*** Adjust shortcuts
Pin your favorite websites to access them faster.

More exciting features are coming soon!
We hope you love this update as much as we’ve loved making it.
If you need us you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Another "spit and polish" release, addressing many of the most common issues you've told us about.
Please keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com
And stay tuned! New features are coming soon!

In today's update we've included a bunch of fixes and improvements based on your feedback, so thank you!
If you have questions or need support just pop on over to rdsupport@readdle.com and we'll point you in the right direction.

Meet the new Reading Mode in Documents!
With the stunning reading experience it’s no longer a pain to read favorite books on a small iPhone screen.
Now any PDF document with illustrations, tables, and formulas will perfectly adapt to your iPhone screen, so you can focus on the content without annoying zooming and horizontal scrolling.
To make reading even more comfortable, you can change the font size, brightness, and switch between Day, Night, and Sepia themes.
Just open your PDF file, tap on the sheet icon at the bottom right of the screen and get a truly remarkable reading experience!

Enjoy your reading!
And let us know what you think at rdsupport@readdle.com

Enjoy your reading!

Hello folks!
This week we've made a few minor improvements here and there, so you can enjoy your favorite Documents app.
Thanks for your continuing feedback. We love hearing from you!
If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Today’s update improves your Documents experience with amazing features: a new + button and a scanner in your pocket.
Let's dive in, shall we?

***New Plus Button
Since today creating and importing files from other places to Documents became much easier.

***Scanner in your Documents
With a brand-new scanning technology you’ll be able to turn the mess of paper into clean and professional scans.

We hope you love this update as much as we do.
If you have any questions or need support – just pop on over to rdsupport@readdle.com and we’ll point you in the right direction.

Meet VPN in Documents: access the websites you love and browse the Internet safely!
Let’s dive in, shall we?

*** Access content you love
Now you can change your virtual location to access any website or app you want. Watch Netflix, Disney+ and Hulu, listen to Pandora and enjoy many other services wherever you are.

*** Browse the Internet safely
Public Wi-Fi networks can be harmful to your privacy. VPN encrypts your data, so no evil eye snoops on you while you’re sending an important email or using internet banking at your local taco truck.
At Readdle, we believe privacy is a fundamental human right. That’s why we don’t track your internet activity and we don’t sell your data.

*** Universe fastest VPN
Stay safe online without slowing down. Enjoy your content anywhere, anytime, uninterruptedly.

Documents by Readdle is where all your files come to life.
Enjoy our new features and share your feedback with our Support Team at rdsupport@readdle.com

We know you’re ready for iOS 14 - so is Documents! 
Widgets? Scribble support? Yes please! 
Documents is here and ready with a cavalcade of new features:

*** Amazing Action widgets
Quickly access your favorite actions such as Music, Video, or Browser. Or even recently opened files and folders.

*** Picture in Picture
Since now you can watch a video in Documents while browsing Safari or using other apps.

*** Scribble support
Now you can turn your handwriting into text. Scribble makes actions like filling out PDF forms or notes taking fast and easy. (available on iPad only)

We hope you enjoy this release as much as we’ve enjoyed making it.
Love Documents? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Documents even better.
Got a question? Write to rdsupport@readdle.com

Documents gets a fantastic update for its video player!
Now you can extract audio from video, multitask with Video mini-player, stream with Chromecast, and much more! Update now and let’s dive in:

*** Extract audio from video
Get an mp3 file with the sound while your original video remains untouched. This is invaluable for lectures and music videos and you don’t need any suspicious online converters for this task. Documents handles all the magic for you.

*** Multitask with Video mini-player
Watch videos while browsing other files with the new Video mini-player. Enjoy a hands-on review of a new bike while googling where to buy it in your city. Watch a lecture while making notes in the margins of your textbook. There are many ways to use it to boost your productivity.

*** "Always Landscape" mode
Enjoy watching movies in the most comfortable way as Documents plays videos in the landscape orientation. This is perfect for lying in a bed with the latest episode of your favorite show.

*** Chromecast support
Stream videos, movies, and websites from Documents to your TV with Google Chromecast. Moreover, you can use your iPhone with Documents as a remote control while watching a movie on your TV. You’ve asked for it – we did it!

With all these new video actions, you won’t need a separate video player app anymore. Documents is now a place where all your videos come to life. We hope you enjoy this update as much as we’ve enjoyed making it.

Love Documents? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Documents even better.
Got a question? Write to rdsupport@readdle.com

Say Hey to Siri Shortcuts in Documents!
Ask Siri to play music or jump to your favorite files, and see the magic happening! What Siri and Documents can do together? Here’s a handy collection at your service: 

*** Play music
Ask Siri to play your favorite tracks without even touching your iPhone. Perfect while driving or cooking!

*** Open the browser
Access the internet faster by using a voice command.

*** Search for any file
Instantly activate the search in Documents and find your crucial files in a snap.

*** Open recent or favorite files
Jump to the files you need the most by simply asking Siri.

*** Turn VPN on 
Enjoy safe browsing and your favorite websites wherever you are. Update now, go to Settings, and create your first voice command. 

Love Documents? Rate us! Your feedback is music to our ears, and it helps us make Documents even better.
Got a question? Write to rdsupport@readdle.com

Documents by Readdle comes to M1 Mac! Meet your first super app for desktop!
Today we are delighted to bring everything you loved in Documents on iPhones & iPads to Macs running Apple Silicon.

It lets you do what you want with your files without jumping between dozens of apps: manage all your files and cloud services; browse the web; connect a built-in VPN to stay private; listen to music; watch videos; read books; edit PDFs; open 40+ file-formats including .flac, .mkv, .avi, .rar 

How to get Documents for M1 Macs for free?
1. Launch the Mac App Store
2. Search for ‘Documents by Readdle’ using the Search field at the top left.
3. In the search results on the right, click on the ‘iPhone & iPad Apps’ tab.
4. Click ‘Get’ next to the Documents by Readdle listing to begin downloading the app. 

If you already use Documents on your iPhone and iPad, you’ll feel right at home on the Mac. What’s more, if you subscribe to Documents Plus on iOS, you’ll have all the premium features available to you on the Mac as well at no additional cost. Enjoy the same desktop-class PDF editing and the world’s fastest built-in VPN now on your Mac.

Over the last few years, Documents has evolved from an app for file storage into "The One App to Rule them all". We’ve been hard at work building Documents into a powerful experience that saves you the hassle of switching between apps, and with today’s release bringing Documents to M1 Macs, we’re delighted to begin this new chapter for the desktop experience as well.

Download Documents for free from the Mac App Store and let us know what you think about it at rdsupport@readdle.com
We hope you love this update as much as we’ve loved making it!

Meet Documents X: the fastest app for file action!
We turned from a simple file manager into a powerful super-app with hundreds of actions.

While we’ve made dozens of improvements to the app, there are a few key elements at the heart of the new Documents X:
*** Smart Actions to speed up your workflows.
*** Faster access to cloud storages.
*** Fresh redesigned experience.
With this update, we set the foundation of future Documents. It’s stable, looks stunning, and makes you faster than ever. Yet this is just the beginning – our first release in a sequence of updates that will bring more actions, more opportunities, and more productivity to your hands!

Got a question? Write to rdsupport@readdle.com
